TopicTitle: Waffles vs french toast! Who will win.

Articles.Content:
Crepes are the best. They are like really thin, foldable pancakes that you can put more stuff on!

Be careful. Now you will have 2 enemies against you.

I

Crepes are the best. They are like really thin, foldable pancakes that you can put more stuff on!

Traditional Russian pancakes are much, much tastier than crepes.

But still, waffles FTW.

Crepes are the best. They are like really thin, foldable pancakes that you can put more stuff on!

Crepes?!?!?? Sacrilege! Boy, I hope you're carrying a tank of O2. Decompression in 3... 2... 1...

PANCAKES!

*ahem*. That out of the way, I prefer french toast to waffles.

Edited December 26, 2014 by Skylab

I change my mind.

French toast FTW!

But may there be another entry into this contest? Like Cinnamon rolls? (Not the store bought crappy ones. The home made Cinnabun-esk (not as large and not triple bypass-ish) good ones.

I change my mind.

i change my mind.

French toast ftw!

But may there be another entry into this contest? Like cinnamon rolls? (not the store bought crappy ones. The home made cinnabun-esk (not as large and not triple bypass-ish) good ones.

oh my what a genuine surprise!

meet me behind the building at 5:00 pm to get the money i promised you

I change my mind again! I think. maybe. I don't really know

anyway here's a picture

Also, I would like to thank r4ptor for his "donation" to the Unified Alliance of Unrecognized Breakfast Foods "For Peace", which we expect will come soon
cinnamon rolls are too hard. its either buy them, get those crappy canned ones, or spend 3 hours in the kitchen.
lol nice programming console where did ya get it?

cinnamon rolls are too hard. its either buy them, get those crappy canned ones, or spend 3 hours in the kitchen.

Still worth it in the end, even though it can be a pain to make.

But, I'll go with french toast though.

lol nice programming console where did ya get it?

I got it from the IOS AppStore. It's called Python Programming Language

I have both... I make French Toast on the waffle iron. Mmmmmmmmmmm!

That is not the French Toast I know and love...

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-reLMrNG0c2M/UD8ARMQPnjI/AAAAAAAAA8M/IUzXvV7CFQU/s1600/Golden+fried+egg+++bread.JPG

That's the french toast I voted for...

Eggy bread.

Day 57, I am still disgusted with over 50% of people on this thread for liking french toast.

And I am ashamed that people with such an interest in spaceflight, would degrade their bodies by sticking french toast into their mouths, of all places.

And I am ashamed that people with such an interest in spaceflight, would degrade their bodies by sticking french toast into their mouths, of all places.

Dammit Zed you beat me to it.

I prefer French toast because I do not have a waffle maker. And store-bought waffles taste awful, even with pure Canadian maple syrup.
